Question: This song appears on this person's fourth studio album, 808s & Heartbreak.
Hints: An outspoken and controversial celebrity, this person has frequently spoken out against homophobia in hip hop music.
On September 7, this person debuted a new song "Love Lockdown" at the 2008 MTV Video Music Awards.
In 2009, this person collaborated with Nike to release his own shoe, the Air Yeezys, with a second version released in 2012.
